Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.library.library_management.data.presentation.controllers.user.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
Controller class for managing user-related operations in the library management system.

The UserController handles user-facing functionalities such as displaying user information, listing all books, showing available books for borrowing, and providing details on a user's borrowings. It interacts with the service and DAO layers to retrieve data and passes it to the appropriate view templates.

This class is marked with the Controller annotation for integration with the Spring MVC framework, processing requests prefixed with /user.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      @Autowired public UserController(BorrowingDAO borrowingDAO, BookDAO bookDAO, BookService bookService)
      Constructs a new UserController and injects the required dependencies.
      Parameters:
      borrowingDAO - the service used for borrowing-related operations
      bookDAO - the DAO used for book-related database operations
      bookService - the service used for managing book availability and related operations

  • Method Details

    • showUserInfo

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public String showUserInfo(@PathVariable("id") String userId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the main page for a specific user.

      Adds the provided user ID to the Model, enabling the front-end to display user-specific information.

      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier for the user
      model - the Model object used to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the main user view template

    • showAllBooks

      @GetMapping("/books") public String showAllBooks(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of all books in the library system.

      Uses the BookDAO.getAll() method to retrieve a list of all Book entities. The list is added to the Model for rendering in the view template.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for displaying all books

    • showAvailableBooks

      @GetMapping("/available-books") public String showAvailableBooks(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of books that currently have available copies for borrowing.

      Uses BookService.getBooksWithAvailableCopies() to retrieve a list of BookWithAvailableCopiesDTO, representing books with their corresponding available copies. The results are added to the Model and passed to the view template.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for displaying books with available copies

    • showUsersBorrowings

      @GetMapping("/{id}/borrowings") public String showUsersBorrowings(@PathVariable("id") String userId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of borrowings for a specific user.

      Retrieves all borrowings for the given user ID using BorrowingDAO.getByUserId(String) and adds both the borrowings and user ID to the Model. The results are used to render a detailed view of the user's borrowings.

      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      model - the Model object used to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for displaying a user's borrowings
